summary: It adds sandstone armor that can be found in riverwood on the patio-like area parallel to the road.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds sandstone armor that can be found in riverwood on the patio-like area parallel to the road.Its in a specially textured chest called "The Sandstone Chest".If you wanna get it of the steam workshop here is the link:Â http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=300913179&searchtext=Sandstone+Armor

Requirements: Skyrim

Compatibility: It may be affected by mods that alter the meshes of the daedric armor but not conflict,and everything else should work fine.
author: Gunchap Red Follower of Celestia
